name: Mnemonic
summary: Mnemonic is a noire adventure made in the Amnesia Fortnight 2014 of Double Fine.

name: Mnemonic Devices
summary: Mnemonic Devices is a sci-fi/romance about a person who loses their memory, and wakes up to find themselves married to someone they don’t know, with a voice in their head who seems to understand more about their life than they do. To top it all off, they find out they have a terrible choice to make. To help them do it, the player is able to view memories of their past to help them decide their future.

name: Mnemonic
summary: This game places you at the helm of a cutting-edge space fighter, navigating through the vastness of a starry backdrop.

name: Mnamosyna
summary: Mnamosyna is an action roguelike game where you challenge dungeons to find your memories stolen by a dragon. Choose from four weapons with different attributes and learn skills that you can use to defeat enemies and use the memories you recover to create combo attacks that combine attack and evasion

name: Mnemocyne Complex
summary: An atmospheric narrative where daily routine shatters and reality starts to twist. Explore mysterious places, make choices that shape the path, and uncover hidden secrets in a cycle of days that is never the same. Every decision pulls you closer to truth—or deeper into doubt.
